div.p: K.B. designed the study, completed a majority of the analysis, and wrote the entirety of the manuscript. G.V. helped develop the HiFLOR model, and G.V. and H.M carried out the experiments. G.V. also provided key suggestions on research topics to explore. H.M. provided key suggestions on the analysis. T.K. assisted in the statistical analysis and provided guidance on the analysis. J.K. developed ADT-HURSAT data and provided it for analysis. J.K. provided minor suggestions on experimental design. K.D. helped design and write a description of the bias corrections for HiFLOR. C.W. was the primary developer of the bias corrections for HiFLOR.
